item.description:
Hello all,

Sadly one of our beloved members Don “Mitch” Mitchell passed away last week from complications of a motorcycle accident. His memorial gathering has been scheduled for Sunday 2/10/2013 at the Ukrainian Hall on 961 Wethersfield Ave. Hartford Ct. The memorial will start at 2:00pm and end at 5:00pm. This is a potluck event so food and drink donations will be gladly accepted. Please let me know what you plan to bring so we can plan.

If you can not make the event but would like to send a sympathy card, please send to Don’s girlfriend.  

Sunita Sookram

846 New Britain Ave

Hartford, CT 06106

 

Please contact me directly if you have additional questions regarding this event.

 

Thank you,

Margaret Webster

(860) 367-6118

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Don 'Mitch' Mitchell's memorial gathering
